name: Dragon Stone (Ohko Stone)
description: Textured inert stone commonly used in aquascaping.
source_notes: Dragon/Ohko stone is generally considered inert in freshwater aquascapes.

name: Seiryu Stone
description: Popular aquascaping stone that can raise KH/GH over time.

name: Lava Rock
description: Porous volcanic rock; generally inert and good for bacterial colonization.

name: Spider Wood (Azalea Root)
description: Branchy wood used for aquascapes; may leach tannins initially.

name: Manzanita Wood
description: Hard, branching wood often used for aquascaping; typically sinks after soaking.

name: Cholla Wood
description: Cactus skeleton wood used for shrimp tanks and nano scapes.
source_notes: Generic commodity; seeded from Amazon search URL.

name: Mopani Wood
description: Dense wood that often sinks easily but can release tannins.
source_notes: Generic commodity; seeded from Amazon search URL.

name: Slate Stone
description: Layered stone often used for terraces and retaining walls in aquascapes.
source_notes: Generic commodity; seeded from Amazon search URL.
